name: Lonely (itch)
description:
You are alone. Your objective is to find your perfect match. Look for the person that compliments you before you get too lonely.

WASD/Arrows to move character.

Hold RMB to steer character.

Hold LMB to rotate camera.

Run into match to activate relationship.

Dev Notes -- After finding your match continue to play. More and more people will populate the small town as your score gets higher. There is no end so beware it might take a tole on the computer.
